QuestData.Title: A Looming Menace
QuestData.Description:
The arcane wounds I suffered cannot be healed in the field. I am afraid that they are too grave for me to fight.
I must ask your help again, $n.
You have to find Tharohn and stop her from overloading more consoles.
Doing so would buy Rannan a few precious moments to calibrate the R.A.D. ... R.A.D.D.E.R... whatever he's calling it now.
Maybe then we can thwart the Sundered Flame's machinations.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A Sundered Flame leader who will stop at nothing to wield the power of the Ruins of Karnthar.
QuestData.RewardText:
It is done then.
Now it is all on Rannan. I trust his abilities. They have gotten us this far...
